description:
Shinpei and his friends are ambushed by the shadows and loop for the seventh time. Heine, who time-loops like Shinpei, notices that the loop drifts slightly. Hence, she changes her strategy to eliminate Shinpei. That night, Shinpei and his friends assemble at the school once more to defeat Shide, but he gathers many shadows. An all-out battle between Shinpei and the shadows begins.
Source: Disney+

titles.title: ライツ カメラ アクション
